Text: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0838247/ link given in description is incorrect.
When it's TvTeam. It will always be 10/10!

It was an interesting concept for a movie but executed poorly. There was really no mystery.

They made a big show of her breath on glass.

The big plot hole was how could the injections work if she were dead? Dead = no heartbeat = no circulation. Duh! Also, didn't she get hungry during all that time?

Of course, Ricci was absolutely beautiful in this movie.
A/V Quality is very good. You can play this on your big TV screen.
